Tom Emerson wrote:

> Tom Emerson writes:
> > Once I made the 'max-length-bytes' change I'm able to crawl, though I
> > get a disturbingly small number of documents (i.e., 14) when I expect
> > a couple of orders of magnitude more than that.
>
> Indeed, a path scope crawl using the same seed has crawled over 1600
> documents so far and is only "23%" complete. Shouldn't the surt pattern
> provide the same level of functionality?

Yes.  And I'm sure it does.  I just haven't spent any time with it.  
Maybe someone else can explain.
St.Ack
